text_block_list.text: I was taking a walk around town on my day off, when...
Uuuuuggh... Uuuuuuuuuggghhh........
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
...I saw a certain someone. 
This time, the familiar shaking sight was accompanied by a faint 
mumble.
Uhya!? I'm sorry, so sorry! I'll get out of your way――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Wait, what? Trainer-san...? 
Ahhhh, it's you... Hello...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Uhhh, well... I came to buy clothes, but, um... 
Going into a trendy store like that is too much for me to handle...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
N-no, e-even regular clothes are way too good for me! 
I'm sorry! I'll just put on those trash bags over there and goooo!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Huuh!? B-but I don't have anything... left to wear... 
Trash bags are all I have left...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
...Yesterday, I was sorting through the clothes I don't wear 
anymore. But it ended up with all my clothes getting torn to 
shreds...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
It's my fauullltt.... 
I opened the window all the way...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I- I just wanted some fresh air! I had no idea that'd happen to 
my blouses and skirts... Uuugghhhh....
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
...Best not to ask too many questions. Long story short, she 
came to buy new clothes, but couldn't work up the courage to 
go shopping alone. In that case――

Huuuhhh!? 
No, it's okay!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I got shot straight down...

Oh!? Ah, uh, well, it's not because I don't want to go in with 
you...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I-it's fine! Don't worry! I- I, I...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I'll put on the trash baaaaaaaaaag!!!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She ran off, but slower than normal. Maybe it's hard to run in 
that long skirt. Betting on the new possibility of catching up to 
her, I took off!

――Huff... huff... huff... 
Wh-why...!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Why are you chasing meeeee!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: And, finally――
Hwwaaaaaaa!? Y-you actually caught up to me....!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Eek! 
I'm sorry, so sorry!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
B-but... I- I just can't do it! 
To-today's your precious day off!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I don't... I don't want to cause trouble for you even when you're 
supposed to be on break!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I already goof up so much every day, and I'm always dragging 
you into things...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I don't want to cause any more trouble than I already am...! 
If you keep dealing with me, you'll get worn out for sure...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Her self-deprecation was plain to see, but I could tell she was 
worried about me in her own clumsy way.
That's why I ran... so why'd you chase meeee!? It's only going to make things worse for you, you know!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: I want you to trouble me!

text_block_list.text: Eek!? Th-that's―― Hhhwwwaaaahh!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Oh!? Are you, maybe, um... like that, you know? Do you, uh, enj――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I told her that, as her trainer, I wanted her to be able to trouble 
me without worry. That I wanted her to count on me more.

E-ehhhhhh!? Count on you... 
But, if I did, it'd make you fall apart...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
If you take my hand, I'll fall and drag you down... 
You'll get beaten and bruised, I just know it...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=27>Then we'll stand back up together, as many times as it takes.</size>

text_block_list.text: ...Er, um....? Thank you, very much...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Sounded like she tacked a question mark at the end there... 
But I said what I wanted to say. She'll have to take it from here. 
Though, in the meantime――

Oh...!!! 
T-that's right...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Ummm, well... I'm looking... forward to... it??
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Still tacking on those question marks. 
The two of us headed back downtown, but――
I'm very sorry, but we're closed for the day...
text_block_list.name: Store Employee

text_block_list.text: Whaaaaaa!? I-it's my fault for running away... I'm so sorry...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Uugghhh... I was right... I'm... 
I'm not even good enough to wear clothes...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
As I consoled her, her head hanging low, I thought to myself. 
That eventually, the day will come where she'll ask me for 
help of her own accord.
